label: CCS constraint factor
definition: Factor applied to the CCS constraint.

label: CO2 Emissions
definition: Carbon Dioxide Emissions for the entire aircraft fleet over the years.

label: CO2 per use
definition: Quantity of CO2 per kWh of energy used.

label: CO2 tax reference
definition: CO2 tax reference for objective computation.

label: Max budget constraint
definition: Maximum budget that can be invested in Energy production and CCUS technos.

label: Max budget
definition: Maximum budget that can be invested in Energy production and CCUS technos.

label: Ratios of Energy Consumption vs Production
Alpha
definition: Weight of utility objective in optimisation objective function. The weight of climate part is 1- alpha.

label: Cache File Path
definition: Path for the cache file id the option cache type is set to Hdf5Cache.

label: Cache Type
definition: Type of cache in GEMS (could be simple, full memory or stored in a Hdf5 file.

label: Carbon capture direct air capture AmineScrubbing array mix
definition: Carbon capture direct air capture AmineScrubbing array mix.

label: Carbon capture direct air capture CalciumPotassiumScrubbing array mix
definition: Carbon capture direct air capture CalciumPotassiumScrubbing array mix.

label: Carbon capture flue gas capture CalciumLooping array mix
definition: Carbon capture flue gas capture CalciumLooping array mix.

label: Carbon capture flue gas capture MonoEthanolAmine array mix
definition: Carbon capture flue gas capture MonoEthanolAmine array mix.

label: Carbon Capture Production by type
definition: Production of carbon capture by type (flue gas or DAC).

label: Carbon quantity to be stored
definition: Rest of carbon quantity after cabon demand sell that needs to be stored.

label: Carbon storage constraint
definition: Constraint applied to the carbon storage.

label: Carbon to be stored constraint
definition: Constraint applied to the carbon to be stored.

label: Carbonstorage constraint ref
definition: Reference for the carbon storage constraint.

label: List of CCS streams
definition: List of Carbon Capture and Storage Streams.

label: CO2 emissions for CCS
definition: CO2 emissions data for Carbon Capture and Storage technologies.

label: CO2 emissions objective
definition: Value of the CO2 emissions objective. Lower is the value, better is the objective accomplished.

label: Design Space
definition: List of the design variable, value boundaries and activation status.

label: Electricity array mix
definition: Break down of the electricity mix.

label: Electricity demand
definition: Electricity demand dependent of population and efficiency improvement.

label: Elec demand constraint Reference
definition: Reference for the Elec demand Constraint.

label: Electricity Demand constraint
definition: Constraint applied to the electricity net production.

label: CO2 intensity from Energy production
definition: CO2 intensity of the way to produce energy.

label: CO2 intensity from Energy production after use
definition: CO2 intensity of the way to produce energy after usage.

label: Energy consumption woratio
definition: Quantity of energy consumed without ratio.

label: Energy Demand
definition: Global predicted energy demand for primary energy resources (from IEA database).

label: Investments by Energy
definition: Dataframe of investments for each energy type over the years.

label: Energy Investment by year
definition: Dataframe going from macroeconomics to energy mix for MDA.

label: Energies Mix
definition: Break down of the energy mix.

label: Energies Prices after Carbon Tax
definition: Energy prices with carbon taxes taken into account.

label: Energy Production Quantity
definition: Global predicted energy production for primary energy resources (from IEA database).

label: Energy Production Quantity Detailed
definition: Details of the net energy produced.

label: Energy Production objective
definition: Value of the energy production objective.

label: Exp min
definition: Methode using exponetial function when vlaue is close to a minimum to obtain a smooth evolution.

label: Export xvect
definition: Export de actual point of the MDA or MDO.

label: Flue Gas Effect Flag
definition: Flag to Add the effect of flue gas ratio on carbon capture efficiency

label: CO2 concentration in Flue gas
definition: Percentage of C02 present in Flue gas emitted by the power plant

label: Flue gas effect
definition: Taken into account flue gas ratio or not.

label: Average CO2 concentration in Flue gas
definition: Average CO2 concentration in Flue gas for all energies considered.

label: Flue Gas Production Ratio
definition: Ratio of flue gas production for each emissing factory vs the total flue gas production (will be useful to report CCS on emissing technologies in later work).

label: Total Flue Gas Production
definition: Total flue gas production, sum of flue gas production of each emissing factory.

label: Energy Mix Heat Losses percentage
definition: Percentage of energy lost with heat stream (difference between energy used by heat plants and hat total final consumption).

label: Hydropower production constraint reference
definition: Hydropower production reference for constraint computation.

label: Hydropower production current
definition: Current production of energy due to hydropower.

label: Production Plant Initial Age Distribution
definition: Initial age distribution of the power plant.

label: Investments before year start
definition: Investments before year start for the technology in order to compute the predicted production of the energy of planned technology plants.

label: Energy Mix Investment Coefficients
definition: Coefficients of energy mix investments (not normalized) to distribute the total investments.

label: Investment mix
definition: For each year, give the weight of the investment in each concerned sector.

label: Invest objective ref
definition: Reference used for the investment objective.

label: Invest Sum ref
definition: Reference used for the investment sum constraint.

label: Invest constraint ref
definition: Reference used for the investment constraint.

label: Invest Limit Reference
definition: Reference Limit used for the investment constraint.

label: Investment Constraint
definition: Constraint applied to difference of energy investment given by macroeconomy and design space.

label: Invest constraint ref
definition: Reference used for the investment constraint.

label: Techno Mix Investment Coefficients
definition: Coefficients of technology mix investments (not normalized) for a specific energy to distribute the energy investments.

label: Energy Mix Losses percentage
definition: Percentage of energy losses (distribution transmission and transport of all energies) of the energy mix compared to raw production.

label: Land demand by technology
definition: Land surface requested by each technologies to fullfilled their production objective.

label: Agricultural surface for food
definition: Needed agricole surface for food depending on the population.

label: Liquid hydrogen constraint reference
definition: Liquid hydrogen production reference for constraint computation.

label: Lost Capital
definition: Capital loss for a given technology

label: Minimum energy production
definition: Minimum energy that is to be produced.

label: Detailed mix prices
definition: Prices of residues and not residues.

label: Detailed mix production
definition: Production load of residues and not residues.

label: Other fuel dict
definition: Data on the other fuel used.

label: Resource Percentage
definition: Percentage of the resource available for the energy production.

label: Percentage of primary energies production
definition: Percentage of primary energies production in total production

label: Scenario
definition: Environmental scenarios described by the International Energy Agency (CPS : Current Policies Scenario, STEPS : Stated Policies Scenario, SDS : Sustainable Development Scenario, HE : High Electricity price level, LE : Low Electricity price level).

label: Solid energy and electricity constraint reference
definition: Solid energy and electricity reference for constraint computation

label: Syngas production constraint reference
definition: Syngas production constraint reference for objective computation.

label: Molar ratio of CO/H2
definition: Molar ratio between monoxyde of carbon and dihydrogene.

label: Technology Molar ratio of CO/H2
definition: Technology molar ratio between monoxyde of carbon and dihydrogene.

label: Technology Capital
definition: Total Capital for a given technology

label: Technology Consumption Quantities
definition: Quantity of resource consumption by the technology considered.

label: Techno consumption woratio
definition: Quantity of resource consumption by the technology considered without ratio.

label: Techno detailed consumption
definition: Detail of the consumption of the technology considered.

label: Production Technology Properties
definition: Properties and information of the technology considered.

label: Technology Investments
definition: Dataframe of investments for each technology type over the years for a given energy.

label: Technologies Mix
definition: Break down of the technologies production.

label: Technology Production Quantities
definition: Quantity of the different products produced by technology.

label: Time step
definition: Time step in years per period.

label: Total Capital
definition: Total capital for a given technology

label: Total prod h2 liquid
definition: Total amount of energy coming from liquid H2 production.

label: Total prod minus min prod constraint df
definition: Total production of energy minus the production constraint.

label: Total prod minus min prod constraint ref
definition: Total production of energy minus the production constraint reference.

label: Total prod solid fuel elec
definition: Total amount of energy coming from solid fuel production.

label: Transport Cost
definition: Cost of the transport of energy or resources.

label: Transport Margin
definition: Margin applied to the cost of transport.

label: Transport Margin Scenario
definition: Transport margin for the considered scenario.

label: Transport Price Scenario
definition: Transport price for the considered scenario.
